name: Trick
description:
Trick is a local-multiplayer game that players can control both the Hero and the dungeon itself which created by the Boss.

For the Hero, you can use weapons such as sword, shield and bow bought before stepping into the dungeon, to avoid deadly traps. Tapping the keyboard to walk and slash!

For the Boss, you can choose the level of each room in the dungeon with a limited budget, and control the traps to kill the Hero. Higher level , higher difficulty, higher cost. Clicking the mouse to put him death!

What if the Hero successfully beat up the Boss? Their status and wealth exchange!

Download and have a try!
